name: First Principles: An app to equip every disciple of Jesus with tools and teachings for making disciples of all nations!
description: This app provides disciples of Jesus with a guided series of Bible studies for making disciples of all nations.  These studies are intended to build the core convictions necessary for someone to make informed decisions about their faith, discipleship, and baptism.  We pray these scriptural lessons and tools serve Godâ€™s purpose and both encourage and equip the saints for His will all over the world.
